info.author: Ilkka Tuohela
info.description:
This project contains some commmand line tools and python libraries to 
control Mixxx dj software. 

Installing the modules requires musa music library tools for album, song 
and playlist processing. Musa is not otherwise used (no DB import or music
library merging is implemented).

The scripts include:

mixxx-automix
- List tracks in automix list, add or remove tracks by path 

mixxx-crates
- List crates, list song paths in crates

mixxx-lookup
- Search songs from mixxx database matching artist, album, title, comment or genre
  fields

mixxx-playlists
- List, import, export or remove mixxx playlists. Import/export requires m3u lists
  and musa playlists configuration done correctly for now

mixxx-trackinfo
- Show relevant database fields from mixxx database for given tracks
info.name: pymixxx
info.summary: Module for Mixxx integration to Musa library management tools
info.html_description:
This project contains some commmand line tools and python libraries to
control Mixxx dj software.

Installing the modules requires musa music library tools for album, song
and playlist processing. Musa is not otherwise used (no DB import or music
library merging is implemented).

The scripts include:

mixxx-automix
- List tracks in automix list, add or remove tracks by path

mixxx-crates
- List crates, list song paths in crates

mixxx-lookup
- Search songs from mixxx database matching artist, album, title, comment or genre
fields

mixxx-playlists
- List, import, export or remove mixxx playlists. Import/export requires m3u lists
and musa playlists configuration done correctly for now

mixxx-trackinfo
- Show relevant database fields from mixxx database for given tracks
